My name is: My name is Danrley Alves dos Santos, I'm from Brazil and I have extensive experience as a programmer through several companies such as: Maida Health, Max.ia, Healtyou, among others.
I am a graduate: I am a graduate in Computer Science, right after I got a Master in Computer Engineering and System by the State University do Maranhão - UEMA. I was a computer science professor at the Instituto Federal do Maranhão - IFMA. I left a Phd e to the classroom to dedicate myself and Focus 100% on Software Engineering.
I love working: I love working with communicative people who teach me to be a better human being. I find it surprising what technology causes in people's lives and directly impacts society.
contribution: Contribution as one of the project developers.
ChallengeJusTravel: Challenge held for Just Travel company.
ProjectConvert: Project developed for lead capture and conversion.
MasterEngineer: Work developed in the Master's program in Computer and Systems Engineering.
starWras: Test carried out for a company.

mardoqueu.name: Mardoqueu Sousa
mardoqueu.occupation: Fullstack Software Engineer | Spring Boot | API REST | Hibernate | Nexus | Java | SQL
mardoqueu.review: I met Danrley at the federal institute, he has a unique ability to adapt in learning new programming technologies and is also an excellent teacher. He was always very proactive and also has an intense passion for the technology field, used to stay late at work to meet goals and our coordinators never doubted his professional capacity and determination in the information technology area.

luan.name: Luan David Carrilho
luan.review: Danrley has strong technical skills and personal qualities that are fundamental in any organization. I highlight his willpower, empathy, curiosity and excellent communication skills. We studied together and worked together on some software projects for 5 years and I consider that he has all the conditions to evolve quickly in his career, I strongly recommend him for all functions that may require technical skills in IT, leadership profile, resilience and organizational culture.

kenny.name: Kenny Wilker
kenny.occupation: Developer | Java | Python | HTML | CSS | Javascript | Git/GitHub | Data Science & Analytics
kenny.review: Extremely passionate about what he does, very attentive to details and competent. In addition to his skills and curricular experiences, he builds trust in his professional relationships and conducts his assignments with total mastery and always in search of innovations. He conveys information clearly and efficiently to all audiences and levels of the organization. It is always a pleasure for me to share a professional experience with Mardoqueu.

lucas.name: Lucas Marques
lucas.occupation: Quality Assurance Engineer/Master in Electrical Engineering - UFPI
lucas.review: Great professional! In addition to delivering excellently from a technical point of view, he establishes good communication and dynamics for project development, besides being a great developer who always meets his established goals, I recommend him!
